page.title: 11Daily Life
page.content: At 7.00 a.m.I start my day. I fold my duvet back to air my bed, open my curtains, cross the landing and go into the bathroom. I put the plug into the washbasin and get washed with a flannel. I dress, polish my glasses, walk downstairs, put on my boots and set off down the lane to get free range eggs for my breakfast. Then I take the dog out on the lead for a walk.My mother drives me in the car to school. At school I play the tenor recorder for Assembly. On Mondays we always have Maths, English, P.E. In my free time I play sport. I am collected from school by my mother and driven to Halifax for my ballet lesson. I get changed into a black leotard and pink tights and pink shoes. Then I go back home, plump up my pillow and go to sleep.
